info.title: Lemon Squeezy
info.description: Digital product sales platform connector for Power Platform. Manage products, customers, orders, subscriptions, license keys, and discounts.

get.description: Returns the authenticated user account.
Returns a list of stores the authenticated user has access to.
Retrieves a single store by ID.
Returns a list of products.
Retrieves a single product by ID.
Returns a list of product variants.
Retrieves a single product variant by ID.
Returns a list of customers.
Retrieves a single customer by ID.
Returns a list of orders.
Retrieves a single order by ID.

post.description: Generates an invoice for an order.

notes.description: Custom notes to add to invoice

download_invoice.description: URL to download the invoice PDF

get.description: Returns a list of order items.
Retrieves a single order item by ID.
Returns a list of subscriptions.
Retrieves a single subscription by ID.

patch.description: Updates a subscription. Use to change variant, pause/unpause, or update billing anchor.

mode.description: void = skip payments, free = continue service free

delete.description: Cancels a subscription. The subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period.

get.description: Returns a list of subscription invoices.
Retrieves a single subscription invoice by ID.
Returns a list of license keys.
Retrieves a single license key by ID.

patch.description: Updates a license key. Use to change activation limit, expiration, or disable the key.

expires_at.description: Expiration date (ISO 8601). Set to null for perpetual.

disabled.description: Set to true to disable the license key

get.description: Returns a list of discount codes.

code.description: Discount code (uppercase letters and numbers, 3-256 chars)

amount.description: Discount amount (cents for fixed, whole number for percent)

duration.description: How often discount applies to subscriptions

duration_in_months.description: Number of months (if duration is repeating)

get.description: Retrieves a single discount by ID.
Returns a list of webhooks.

events.description: Array of event types (e.g., order_created, subscription_updated)

secret.description: Secret key for verifying webhook signatures

get.description: Retrieves a single webhook by ID.

secret.description: Secret key for verifying webhook signatures
